column3: Although the indentation is indeed wrong here, don't do commit with whitespace changes please. We'll fix these in one go with clang-format at some point.\n

http://clang.llvm.org/docs/ClangFormat.html

The repository already includes a configuration file for this.
The plan is to run automatic formatting using `clang-format` on the entire source tree before the release of 0.10 (to minimize conflicts with pull requests).\n
